verses.name: Numbers 15:14
verses.text: And if a stranger sojourn with you, or whosoever be among you in your generations, and will offer an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord; as ye do, so he shall do.

verses.name: Numbers 15:15
verses.text: One ordinance shall be both for you of the congregation, and also for the stranger that sojourneth with you, an ordinance for ever in your generations: as ye are, so shall the stranger be before the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 15:16
verses.text: One law and one manner shall be for you, and for the stranger that sojourneth with you.

verses.name: Numbers 15:17
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
